title: Stimulus, Trump Tweets on Mail-In Voting
itunes:title: Stimulus, Trump Tweets on Mail-In Voting
description:
Guests: Josh Wingrove, Bloomberg White House reporter, Wendy Benjaminson, Bloomberg Politics Editor, Jennifer Nassour, Former Chairwoman of the Massachusetts Republican Party and Founder for Conservative Women for a Better Future, and Kristen Hawn, Democratic Strategist, Senior Advisor at Rokk Solutions.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
